module.name: Asterisk API
module.description: This module is used to add AMI Users
module.changelog: *15.0.22* Packaging of ver 15.0.22 *15.0.21* Packaging of ver 15.0.21 *15.0.20* Packaging of ver 15.0.20 *15.0.19* Packaging of ver 15.0.19 *15.0.18* Packaging of ver 15.0.18 *15.0.17* FREEPBX-23396 Cannot Update Manager-Configuration *15.0.16* SCD-107 added cdr event filter to receive cdr events in sangomartapi *15.0.15* SCD-32 add more rtapi entries to manager_additional.conf *15.0.14* FREEI-3953 Added validation for password field *15.0.13* FREEI-3375 SQL Injection in Asterisk Manager *15.0.12* FREEI-3453: add sangomartapi conference app's entry to manager_additional.conf *15.0.11* FREEI-3453: add sangomartapi_conference entry as an asterisk manager *15.0.10* Packaging of ver 15.0.10 *15.0.9* FREEPBX-21319 Warm spare backup does not restore astersik manager passwords and permissions *15.0.8* FREEI-922 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.7* bump *15.0.6* FREEPBX-20436 XSS vulnerability in manager module *15.0.5* Fixing legacy restore *15.0.4* backup and restore *15.0.3* Fix issue with loading list *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
